title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Germany 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2019, slightly increasing from 2019 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2021.
The line significantly increased by 0.71 from Year 2019 to 2020.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 2.47 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 0.54 was reported at Year 2019
